survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Electric Vehicle Charging Stations
survey_brief: This survey is designed to gather feedback from electric vehicle (EV) owners about their satisfaction with public EV charging stations, including ease of use, availability, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you use public electric vehicle charging stations?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format to simplify response collection. Ensure the options cover all possible usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you use public electric vehicle charging stations?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when selecting a public EV charging station? (Select up to 3)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow respondents to select multiple factors. Limit selections to 3 to prioritize their top choices.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice) with a max selection limit of 3.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when selecting a public EV charging station? (Select up to 3)
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of public EV charging stations in your area?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format with a Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of public EV charging stations in your area?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced when using public EV charging stations?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended format to capture detailed feedback. This can help identify common pain points.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced when using public EV charging stations?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.

questions.question_text: Would you recommend the public EV charging stations in your area to other EV owners?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format to gauge overall satisfaction and likelihood of recommendation.

script.question_text: Would you recommend the public EV charging stations in your area to other EV owners?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.
